(Version 0.0.1.7, updated on 2024-06-17, release history)

semlrtp: Likelihood Ratio Test p-Values for Structural Equation Models

This package includes is used for computing LRT p-values for free parameters in structural equation model using likelihood ratio test (LRT).

See this article for a quick demonstration on how to use this package.

For more information on this package, please visit its GitHub page:

https://sfcheung.github.io/semlrtp/

Installation

The latest developmental version of this package can be installed by remotes::install_github:

remotes::install_github("sfcheung/semlrtp")

Issues

If you have any suggestions and found any bugs, please feel feel to open a GitHub issue here. Thanks.
